lenders.name: Peter

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: this is a wonderful way to directly assist someone in the developing world.
lenders.occupational_info: Busily retired

lenders.occupational_info: I sell homes and land to various people and businesses.  I especially like to help young people find a way to finance their first home.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance!
lenders.occupational_info: I take photographs of nature for the beauty and to share.

lenders.name: Jim & Debbie

lenders.name: Scott

lenders.name: Arjan

lenders.occupational_info: I help with securing a data network at a large University.

lenders.occupational_info: I create software that allows vendors all over the world to market and sell their products on the internet.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Lynn and Mike

Lynn: I have recently graduated from college and am currently blessed to be teaching 1st grade--which I love!!

lenders.occupational_info: I'm interested in green energy and clean technology, and working on a few startup initiatives.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children with learning problems how to read.

lenders.occupational_info: I am French, living in the Netherlands.

lenders.name: Simon

lenders.name: Manu

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy it.

lenders.occupational_info: I work at a medical device company that makes life-saving equipment.

lenders.occupational_info: I work to keep the environment and water clean.

lenders.name: Cheryl & Chelsey
lenders.loan_because: In our own small way we hope to make a significant difference in someone's life.  Someone that we would never have the opportunity to cross paths with were it not for KIVA.

lenders.name: Ravi
lenders.loan_because: I believe that what to us is a little amount of money goes a long way to help others.  I also believe that a donation is like "feeding a man a fish"; it's nice, but it only lasts for a day.  A loan is like "teaching a man [or woman] to fish"; it lasts forever, and allows him or her to create a self-sustaining business that generates more cash flow and contributes to viable and sustainable economic growth in developing nations.  I also just love people from different countries and want to see them succeed!

lenders.name: Tish
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should, and I am so very happy to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people by trying to make the law useful and understandable to them.

lenders.name: Pentastudio Architecture
lenders.loan_because: We hope to assist people with small enterprises improve their abilities to provide for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: We design healthy, creative environments for people working together -- architecture, interior design and graphics.

lenders.name: Leticia
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Ph.D. student in biology.

lenders.name: Morgan Stanley PIF
lenders.loan_because:
Morgan Stanley gave us an opportunity to do something extraordinary for others. The Firm funded our team with an initial set of funds from which we would be able to execute our "Pay It Forward" idea.

For us, working in investment management, micro lending seemed like a fantastic opportunity. What's more, Kiva.org provided us with the best means with which to help others providing micro loans. Through Kiva.org we are able to see exactly where our money is being lent out to while being able to keep in contact with our borrowers.

We had 4 weeks to use this money to make a positive impact in our community. Our team looked to the global community. We took the time we were given, held some fundraisers and were able to raise our initial funding by 500%.

These funds are now loaned out of our non-withdrawable Kiva.org account.

lenders.name: Greenpaperinc
lenders.loan_because:
My work is to see that people most especialy mothers and children enjoy a good life on earth .
You look around you will see many parents who are suppose to wake up in the morning with a cheerfull spirit looking dull and you will ask what seems to be the problem.

Well from survey if the youths and mothers are able to get loans for business creation it will be a much happier world for the children and mothers.

I want to support my community by issuing loans to mothers and youths to set up businesses to support there daily life.
lenders.occupational_info: The Greenpaper Inc is a non governmental organization with Headquaters in  Abuja  Nigeria .We are participating in youths ,education and community development projects in local,national and international level of the globe for the good of the people.

lenders.name: Peter & Susan
lenders.loan_because: Why shouldn't we, who have so much, provide a helping hand - not a handout - to those not as lucky? Being born in the USA is, IMHO, a matter of luck.
lenders.occupational_info: We design schools, universities, hospitals & other buildings for clients throughout California. Susan works in Occupational Medicine, with people hurt on the job, and at a local Free Clinic.

lenders.name: hellohelllo
lenders.loan_because: I love helping other people!  My aunt made this account for me!  I love it!

lenders.name: Kelli
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power to change the world lies in the everyday relationships between people - the further you extend your reach to connect with others, the wider your networks become, the closer we all are, whatever our religion, culture, ethnicity, gender, or language
lenders.occupational_info: I seek to understand the way that culture influences our thoughts and actions - and how a better understanding of those cultures other than our own can provide solutions to political and social problems

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because:
"Be the change you wish to see in the world"  - Ghandi
That's why.
lenders.occupational_info: I educate the future of America and simultaneously (hopefully) open their eyes to  the world around them and hopefully help them realize what they can achieve and accomplish once they set their minds to it.  The students I teach are still at an impressionable age, but they're just learning to reason and comprehend adult topics and situations.  I love each and every one of them as if they were my own.  I could not imagine doing anything else.

lenders.name: Dicey
lenders.loan_because: Helping others makes me feel good!  I believe that, by working together with a global vision, we can each make a difference and have a positive impact on the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the research and development of pharmaceutical and biological drugs.

lenders.name: tricia
lenders.loan_because: If as little as $25 can help someone become more self sufficient and support their families, how can one not. I believe in doing as much as possible to try and make the world a better place. This is a good way to help others all around the world. It takes as many people as possible to join the cause to fight poverty, inequality, protect the environment, and human rights world wide.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage business accounts receiveables for a large corporation. I also volunteer to help abused/neglected kids express themselves through various art programs. I also plan on volunteering abroad someday.

lenders.name: Stefanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people any way I can. I am not wealthy but can surely spare enough money for these micro loans - often times, the same amount that I can easily spend for a meal out can be life changing to someone else in another part of the world.

lenders.name: Goodarz
lenders.loan_because: I believe Kiva provides a unique opportunity for us to alleviate poverty
lenders.occupational_info: doing research on preventing heart disease and strok

lenders.name: Margi
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky in many areas, and I can share.  Wouldn't it be great if everyone who could would?

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: It's a great opportunity for me to offer help others and participate in people's lives all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an operating room.  I set up the instruments and supplies needed and assist the surgeon during the surgery.

lenders.name: desi hrevatis
lenders.loan_because: this is not an act of charity.  this is a manifestation of my belief that, given the right tools, we are all equally capable.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because:
2 Cor 9:6-11
Brothers and sisters, consider this:
whoever sows sparingly will also reap sparingly,
and whoever sows bountifully will also reap bountifully.
Each must do as already determined, without sadness or compulsion,
for God loves a cheerful giver.
Moreover, God is able to make every grace abundant for you,
so that in all things, always having all you need,
you may have an abundance for every good work.
As it is written:

He scatters abroad, he gives to the poor;
his righteousness endures forever.

The one who supplies seed to the sower and bread for food
will supply and multiply your seed
and increase the harvest of your righteousness.

You are being enriched in every way for all generosity,
which through us produces thanksgiving to God.
lenders.occupational_info:
The art is my passion.  
A distributorship to sell golf equipment pays the bills.  My husband and I have been well blessed.   I am so grateful to have found the KIVA organization.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: To give others a chance!
lenders.occupational_info: Family man.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: People helping people is simply better.
lenders.occupational_info: I publish educational curriculum for teaching children ages 2-12

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: solidarity.
lenders.occupational_info: just a man

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because:
"We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give."
— Winston Churchill

 "Loan poor people money on terms that are suitable to them, teach them a few sound financial principles, and they will help themselves"  , Mohammad Yunus
lenders.occupational_info: RPCV Colombia '64-'66

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I have never forgotten what it was like to be poor as a Czech refugee child in Germany after WW II.  Our sponsor gave my family and I the chance to come to the U.S.  I want to give in that spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to care for chronically ill older people whose families cannot or do not wish to care for them at home, or for those who have no families.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: making a difference is an amazing amount of fun.
lenders.occupational_info: I serve as a religious leader for a community of 500 people. I visit the sick, conduct religious services, teach and provide counsel to those in need.

lenders.name: Danny
lenders.loan_because: I love all humans!

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy watching people grow and getting ahead.   I hope the little bit I can help goes a long way. I am encouraged by all these wonderful people working for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for California State Government.

lenders.name: shane
lenders.loan_because: I want to try this
lenders.occupational_info: I bring electricity into homes and businesses

lenders.name: Reanna
lenders.loan_because: My mummy wants me to learn about compassion and helping others.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: it is an elegant way to support people in many parts of the world that want to better their lives and provide a service in their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I help growers in California sell their almond and walnut crops to buyers throughout the world.

lenders.name: jocago
lenders.loan_because: I think it can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I deal in measurement of consumer behaviour.

lenders.name: Gerhard & Tricia
lenders.loan_because: it is better to help people directly, without the profit going to banks.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on machines which process and sort mail.  My wife, Tricia, works as an aide in a school.  She works with children who have physical and or developmental disabilities

lenders.name: Diana & Gordon
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the true power of the internet is to allow individuals to connect in a way that makes the world a smaller, friendlier and better world.

lenders.name: David & family
lenders.loan_because: We believe in micro credit as a way to build peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a think thank that promotes international conflict resolution.

lenders.name: Phyllis
lenders.loan_because: I love the fact that I, with many others, can in a small way positively impact the lives of others. Plus when the money is returned, I can lend it again. It's the gift that keeps on giving!

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: business in their local struggling society.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: I have no reason not to.

lenders.name: Matty
lenders.loan_because: My way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Relaxed

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: "Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.” -Thomas Edison

lenders.loan_because: Jessica and I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Jessica and I are attorneys.  I advise businesses about how they can achieve their goals, and defend them when they are accused of breaking the law.  Jessica currently works for three judges.  She helps them make decisions about how to resolve disputes between people.  She ultimately plans to defend individuals who have been accused of serious crimes.

lenders.name: Alan & Mary Jane
lenders.loan_because: I have faith in humankind and prefer to give directly to those who need it most
lenders.occupational_info: I work to improve the current and future prospects of children and youth in more than 60 countries by raising money from governments and corporation that are used to implement education, health, employment and citizenship programs in those countries

lenders.name: joan & freeman
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in their business endeavors
lenders.occupational_info: Nursing for many years in general hospital

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: At least someone will take "lobbyist money" these days!
lenders.occupational_info: I represent companies before the United States Congress.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: It's a small step in the right direction.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are responsible for each other.
lenders.occupational_info: Selling video conferencing over the internet. www.myvideotalk.com. Online trading

lenders.name: Henry
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I started a computer business back in the 1980's and was very lucky.

lenders.name: esy
lenders.loan_because: the need has been seen, felt, and not forgotten.
lenders.occupational_info: recording the stories of lives that are not commonly heard from, over here.  the way that your life is read and remembered can change the life of another, across the planet.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone that is helping themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I tell homebuyers or home sellers how much their home is worth based on the most recent home sales in their neighborhood.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: everyone benefits when small businesses prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a dream shaper.

lenders.name: Cthulu
lenders.loan_because: it might make a difference

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a reason not to.  I look forward to making another small loan each month.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a fish counter at an American food store.  People want fish, shrimp, shellfish, whatever, I give them what they want.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: "...love is the mystery of the appearance of God.....love is the highest honor for all the nations of men.....be ye manifestations of the love of God....."  Baha'ullah
lenders.occupational_info: I work and volunteer with children---I like to help them with math because it makes them feel better to understand their math---so they can spend more time having fun!!

lenders.name: Julian
lenders.loan_because: it is our responsibility to help others and I want to help those in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies with their legal problems.

lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have a chance to reverse the vicious cycle of poverty.

lenders.name: Bardya
lenders.loan_because: I have more then most, and am grateful for what I have.
lenders.occupational_info: Rewarding

lenders.name: J. B.
lenders.loan_because: I believe good energy creates good energy.  By supporting efforts to further develop the global economy we all prosper and it is the less fortunate half of the world that needs to most help, yet receives the least attention.  Let's all work together to make a difference-globally.  It will help us all.
lenders.occupational_info: Building and developing markets for new software and media services through venture capital.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to help others.  I have so much compared to most people of the world...and when I give of my time, energy and/or money I become more grounded to what's really important in life.  And because of this I have more peace, a greater sense of value and joy in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a great job!...in short I get to encourage, inspire, listen to and help kids!...and their folks, too!

lenders.name: Yuka Ioroi
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this IS the way bringing people out of poverty, thus less crimes, thus less struggles, thus less war, and ultmately, world peace.
lenders.occupational_info: Running a cool little restaurant in Outer Richmond, SF.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I believe healthy small businesses make the world a better place for everyone.

lenders.name: Garry
lenders.loan_because: We should share the world's resources with those who are willing to work to help themselves, their families, and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I start small businesses, grow them into bigger businesses, and then sell them off.

lenders.name: arturo ortiz
lenders.loan_because: I believe in change and helping people you dont know

lenders.name: Tielman
lenders.loan_because: Born and raised in South Africa, I am a child of the developing world. I have seen first hand the impact a small loan can make.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a Food and Beverage Consultancy and I have spent the last ten years in Asia and East Africa.

lenders.name: Alessandra
lenders.loan_because: I watched the KIVA segment on PBS's "Frontline/World."  I was so impressed and touched.  I applaud you for making the world a better place.

lenders.name: Lars Ivar
lenders.loan_because: I believe this model of helping works.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a programmer and consultant, developing software.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I traveld for 5 weeks in India.  It hurt to see how hard the people there work for so little return.  I wanted to help in some way.

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.loan_because: We should help each other out.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: It's all about giving back.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the priviledge to teach and be taught by our children, our future.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: My family and I love to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy their first homes

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed my family with so much and we are so very thankful.  Through his son, Jesus, and the love He has taught me, giving and helping others is an expression of His will and love.  Love is God and action is enabling His will.  These loans are actions and the reason I give is love for others and an obedience to God.

lenders.name: Coco
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: Coco is no longer with us but lives on by rolling over her loans.

lenders.name: Mary Dell
lenders.loan_because: sometimes only a little help is all that is needed to change a life.
lenders.occupational_info: international tour operator. We take groups all over the world

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I feel in my heart that there's good in all people. Sometimes, they just need a bit of help to get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a registered medical assistant by day and a hobbyist on personal time with things such as: Knitting, sewing, papercrafts, constructing of artificial flowers, jewelry creations.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I read about Kiva.org in a magazine and I was so impressed by how elegant the idea was, I signed up immediately. I'm grateful to be able to take even a small part in this movement.
lenders.occupational_info: I draw comic books and produce animation for television.

lenders.name: Griffin's Grandma
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of hope........If not me...... whom?  If not now..... when?

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: It empowers.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I fully subscribe to the belief that if you give a man a fish he'll eat for a day, if you teach a man to fish he'll eat for a lifetime. Assisting people to obtain the tools to be self sufficient betters society world-wide.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work at a company that clones cattle, horses and pigs. The word "clone" causes quite a stir amongst the American public mostly due to a lack of real information as to what cloning really is and what its benefits are.

With a growing human population, and shrinking natural resources, we have to be efficient in how we produce our food. Cloning is a new tool to use in conjunction with regular breeding to pass on desirable but sometimes rare traits like natural disease resistance and efficient feed to meat conversion ratios more effectively. At the end of the day it's still about breeding better animals to feed more people.

lenders.name: Yair
lenders.loan_because: I believe its the right thing to do, no religion necessary.
lenders.occupational_info: I build software for businesses.

lenders.name: Anil
lenders.loan_because: Worked in Africa for 10 years and saw the rich African heritage and unmatched simplicity in African people. Just started to help the needy.
lenders.occupational_info: Information technology

lenders.name: Jeff and Kris
lenders.loan_because: It is a Faith Response.  We have 3 grown children, and have a good life.   We hope to make a small difference for someone else in this way.  "If you love Him, why not serve Him".  We loan because we want to share with others.  To do good, you actually have to do something!
lenders.occupational_info:
Jeff is a Pharmacist and former hospital administrator
Kris is a Hair Stylist

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: So little can do so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professor of psychology in Cairo, Egypt

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I want to do what I can to help people in need.  God has blessed me with a good job and I need to be a good steward of the money he has given me.  I think that this is a good way to use it.

lenders.name: Anne-Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: The more we give, the more there is to go around.
lenders.occupational_info: I sing with orchestras and opera companies all around the United States - and hopefully soon around the world!

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering individuals; effecting change in people's lives, the lives of their families, and their communities.  We are all connected by the common threads of humanity and we need to help one another.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the blessings in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and edit books in the areas of spirituality, empowerment, and parenting.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help provide opportunity for those who could use some.
lenders.occupational_info: Computers - Software Development

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other kids.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a kid. Right now that takes up most of my time.

lenders.name: Mel
lenders.loan_because: I can and it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I'm excited about having a little money go a long way!  This is such a great portal for money to flow where it's needed - and for it to flow back.

lenders.name: Janice & Keith
lenders.occupation: Legal Analyst and Director of Special Events
lenders.loan_because: micro lending makes real changes in the lives of the people receiving the loans.

lenders.name: Yayne-Abeba
lenders.loan_because: I am first generation Ethiopian and I have seen first hand how poverty destroys lives. I believe that we all have a responsibility to eachother in this world. We are all connected in some way.  I feel blessed to be able to help others help themselves live a life with purpose and joy.
lenders.occupational_info: I make people laugh!! I love it!!!!

lenders.name: Van
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Prairie House Gallery
lenders.occupation: Small gallery dedicated to North American art.
lenders.loan_because: One of the goals of Prairie House Gallery is to be a good neighbour.  In our purchase, we try to buy local.  In our practices, we try to go Green.  Kiva gives us one more way to help leave a better place than it might otherwise have been.
lenders.occupational_info:
Prairie House Gallery is a small on-line art gallery that features local artists, (Midwestern), and other artists from the United States, We typically buy directly from the artist, or from one of their direct distributors. In this way, we try to make sure that the artist gets a fair price for his or her work.
The gallery was our dream.  It is more of a "hobby" than a business because we regularly loose money, but we have fun doing it. We are keeping the website for now, but we are not certain what we will do next. We are looking at the possibility of new lines of products, including period artwork prints rescued from damaged books. We also remain committed to the artists that have sold their works with us, and we provide links to the sites of our artists as they develop them.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: in care.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed to be a blessing.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: Such a small amount can make a huge difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to describe how language actually is used, not how it is "supposed" to be used.

lenders.name: MOLLY
lenders.loan_because: it reminds me how much i really have
lenders.occupational_info: computers,computers,computers

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Defne

lenders.occupational_info: poverty alleviation

I learn about geography, culture and humanity.

I lend with the help of my parents.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a middle school student.

lenders.name: Jeremie
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself I know the desire and drive required to build a sustainable business. I also know that everybody needs support - be it financial or emotional - to get where they want to go.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a computer software company that helps money managers operate more efficiently.

lenders.name: Irene
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help people become independant.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and paint.

lenders.name: Jack

lenders.occupational_info: I teach business education at a local high school. This is my second career after working in international marketing.

lenders.name: Elizabeth & Josh
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to use our blessings to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: Elizabeth: I work with children helping them to develop thier communication and confidence to be successful members of society. Josh: I work youth and hope to fill them with a desire to affect positive change through a love for others and for Christ.

lenders.name: Rhett
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a brilliant way to help. It not only gives, but it helps people get on their feet, people who really need it. It is one amazing idea,I am excited to help.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: The Spirit of the Sovereign Lord is upon me, because the LORD has appointed me to bring good news to the poor. He has sent me to comfort the brokenhearted and to announce that captives will be released and prisoners will be freed.
lenders.occupational_info: I make maps with computers to make the city I live in more efficient.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: To support others who are making efforts to improve their lives and the economic well being of their communities.

lenders.name: S n J
lenders.loan_because: Its empowering people to be financially free, and there shouldnt be such struggles in first place, its one world.

lenders.loan_because: We as human beings "need" to help each other to survive, thrive, and to be happy.... that's what life is all about....
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist... painter

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I haven't forgotten where I came from.

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of Elders with Alzheimer's disease.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I thought this would be a good way to feel like I was doing something (however small) to help someone else. It is also a way to feel connected to other people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a television station, helping out with local newscasts and putting stories and videos on the internet.

lenders.name: Keara
lenders.loan_because: God has provided me with the opportunity!

lenders.name: Garzon Family
lenders.loan_because: I've been interested in microfinance for years.  God has blessed me with a well-paying job, so I'm thrilled to be able to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the finances of a family-owned real estate investment company.

lenders.name: Robert & Claudia
lenders.loan_because: Hopefully the people will capitalize on the opportunity presented and succeed in bettering their lives, and especially those of their children.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because:
I've been poor, and I've been affluent.  I'll tell ya' ---being poor SUCKS !!

I feel it's time to lend a hand to those less fortunate than I am.  And this is the ONLY way I know of that actually WORKS!
lenders.occupational_info:
Ne'er-do-well piano player.
Professional musician for more than 50 years.
(22 of them in Air Force bands, including the USAF BAND, Washington, D.C. and the USAF ACADEMY BAND, Colorado Springs, Col.)
Now --Retired......(back to being a ne'er-do-well)..

lenders.name: Cody
lenders.loan_because: I feel that money that may not seem like a huge amount to me IS a huge amount to somone else and they can use it wisely.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I really like that ordinary people can make a difference in a strangers life and the lives of their children. I think it is also amazing how creative these people are.

lenders.name: CMC
lenders.loan_because:
C-I want to help people who need it and I want the world to be safe.
M-I want to help people get money for shoes for the summer, clothes, and food.
C- I want to help people be really safe and I want the world to be safe because I don't want people to die.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves seems the best way to improve lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend most of my time reading and looking after my home and family.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: The good that we do will live on long after we are gone. It is our true legacy.
lenders.occupational_info: I process aeronautical data from 120 countries so that accurate aviation products are provided to pilots.  This enables them to fly anywhere in the world.

lenders.name: Javier y Cristina
lenders.loan_because: Even if you are lucky or not in life, always there are people living worst than you. / Por muy mal que uno esté, desgraciadamente siempre existe alquien peor.

lenders.name: Rima
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference, and help out.  We can all work together to eliminate poverty.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I have a social responsibility to do so.

lenders.name: bret
lenders.loan_because: I want to make money back.
lenders.occupational_info: Terrible.  Do something else for a living.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.occupational_info: Work in the horticultural industry, selling fruit to Australian retailers

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: I want you to have the same opportunities as I do. Opportunities to build a future for my family in a way that will also benefit the community I live in.
lenders.occupational_info: I have my own business helping people to access the Internet when they travel away from home. I do this by setting up Wireless hotspots in public locations. I also design and build websites and web applications for other local business people.

lenders.name: Marvin
lenders.loan_because: Have been to  cambodia and realize the need in this country

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because:
I can.  There isnt any other reason why.
I am able to financially, so why should I not?
It may not be thousands, or even hundreds of dollars... but I can at least give SOMETHING.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the Air Force, and I work on computers and computer networks - the linking of computers together enabling the sharing of information.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It is just the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Writer. Documentary filmmaker.

lenders.name: Rajib Lochan
lenders.loan_because: I can help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Starting up the business in the areas of Telcoms, IT, & Broadcasting mainly in consulting, Resourcing, Outsourcing work (software development, Call Centres, etc..).  Providing solutions, in the areas of IPTV, Digital TV, CableTV, MobileTV, VoIP, etc... (raj_mahalik@yahoo.co.uk)

lenders.name: Andrew and Rhett
lenders.loan_because: Good people do good things.
lenders.occupational_info: We raised money on Andrew's 40th birthday and have lent and relent it to people who need a little help to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: Just trying to make a difference one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help hospitals in the US become more effective in treating their patients.

lenders.name: Don & Nancy
lenders.loan_because: we are able to and hope to leave the world a better place than the one we entered.

lenders.name: Anand
lenders.loan_because: You never know where opportunity will take you.
lenders.occupational_info: Science and technology development

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I believe in responsible microcredit. Loans allow entrepreneurs who need financing to get started with their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the areas of human rights,  public legal education, and business administration for groups that have traditionally been disadvantaged.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I heard of this website through a family member who has worked in Microfinance in Africa for several years. I really like the concept of helping people to help themselves, hopefully in a long term way.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I am so thrilled to have an opportunity to directly help a person who has a good plan to make life better and more secure.
lenders.occupational_info: Students come to my house to learn how to play the piano. They are boys and girls from 6 to 18 years old. I also have some students who are much older and have always liked music and want to play themselves.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurship offers people dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur!

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I have much respect for anyone who attempts to better their life by putting faith in people and economics.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an auditor of various types of companies including manufacturers and not-for profits.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people across the globe but still keep it on a personal level.

lenders.name: john mck
lenders.loan_because: We have so much in the west, and can all afford to give something to support those in need around the world.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I have much to be thankful for and I believe it's important to give back to the world.

lenders.name: Fred  Toulouse FRANCE
lenders.loan_because: micro credit is the key to help people in need

lenders.name: Dean Pajevic
lenders.loan_because: So many people in the world get by on so little. It feels good to help someone out. And because of kiva.org, it's super easy to do.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a medical laboratory near Boston.

lenders.name: Carlotta
lenders.loan_because: I feel the program is the most effective mechanism to eradicate poverty worldwide.
lenders.occupational_info: I investigate property for the presence of contamination that may be a hazard to people or the environment and devise ways to make it safe once more.

lenders.name: Mickie & Steve
lenders.loan_because: As as a female small business owner myself, I know the power of supporting my family with my business. What an opportunity to help others gain the same support and independence I have found!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an attorney, and own my own firm. I mostly work from my home, but meet with clients at my office. My husband is a medical student, who will soon be a cardiologist.

lenders.name: Harry Gold
lenders.loan_because: There are plenty of honest, hard working, creative people around the world who could use a little help from good neighbors, and it's easy to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just a regular guy. I currently work building mobile apps and web sites.

lenders.name: Andrea & Drew
lenders.loan_because: We're fortunate enough to give others the same "leg-up" we've been given.

lenders.name: Stan
lenders.loan_because: Namaste

lenders.name: Doug&Erika
lenders.loan_because: I've worked hard to own my own home and have children.  I want to give other hard workers a chance to realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher who now stays home to raise my three young children.

lenders.name: Jane Cummings Carlson
lenders.loan_because: It's time to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I help protect the health of the forests.

lenders.name: Jay & Ci
lenders.loan_because: We want to bless other people the way God blessed us.

lenders.name: www.3outcomes.com
lenders.loan_because: Sharing what I have has me appreciate it. Looking at the people who are starting and enhancing their businesses also has me more inspired with mine. And, I'd love to meet the people I loan to so that I can bring more vitality and money to their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Search on "Living Green" in itunes podcast directory and you will find my podcast. It was rated in the Top 100 of itunes in June of 2007.  I coach business executives and do keynotes. Learn more at www.3outcomes.com.

lenders.name: Doug and Karen Williams
lenders.loan_because: Some very important people encouraged us to do this.

lenders.name: Jarrod
lenders.loan_because: I am deeply committed to creating opportunities for others and to making a real difference to others.  I have a driving passion to do little things that evoke huge, positive changes in the lives of other people.  We can all save the world - one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: My work entails investing in residential and commercial real estate.  I have a vast array of interests in which I actively participate and I always enjoy traveling and meeting new people.  Feel free to contact me or learn more about me through my LinkedIn or Facebook profiles.

lenders.name: rothkids
lenders.loan_because: We have traveled to many places and seen how much difference a few dollars can make.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others a fighting chance to achieve a better quality of life for themselves and the community in which they live.
lenders.occupational_info: Licensing of products and technology for the purpose of improving human health.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: All of the loan goes directly to the entrepeneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I use ultrasound to take pictures and measurements of people's hearts. I enjoy the challenge and have been scanning for thirty years.
